content: this cute penguin pattern could be used as coasters appliques or strung together for a bunting finished penguin measures 5 tall and wide please don t sell my pattern or pictures you may sell penguins you make if you do sell finished products attributing credit to me would be greatly appreciated join me on instagram @onfishershook enjoy materials = medium 4 weight yarn white color 1 ~3g black color 2 ~4g orange color 3 <1g yellow color 4 < 5g 5mm h crochet hook scissors darning needle
